title: Holiday Readiness, Part Four: What You Should Be Thinking About One Month Out ? Monitoring and Alerting
description: November is here. Now it?s crunch time. Hopefully, implementing the solutions in parts one through three of this series has kept you busy over the last few months. In those articles, we covered security, flash crowd management, disaster recovery, and performance optimization checklists. If you are not in a code freeze yet, work with your Akamai account team to review the content to determine what features you still have time to enable.
author: Michael Hansen
